trans-unit.source: Paints an area with an image.
trans-unit.target: 使用图像绘制区域。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> that defines its content as an image, which is specified by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>是一种<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>，其内容定义为一个映像，通过指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can control how the image is stretched, aligned, and tiled, enabling you to produce patterns and other effects.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制拉伸图像方式，对齐和平铺，使你能够生成模式和其他效果。

trans-unit.source: The following images show some effects that can be achieved with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示可通过实现一些副作用<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>。

trans-unit.source: ![ImageBrush output examples](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-imagebrushexamples.gif "ImageBrush output examples")
trans-unit.target: ![ImageBrush 输出示例](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-imagebrushexamples.gif "ImageBrush 输出示例")

trans-unit.source: An ImageBrush can paint shapes, controls, text, and more
trans-unit.target: 使用 ImageBrush 可以绘制形状、 控件、 文本和的详细信息

trans-unit.source: As mentioned, an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> paints an area with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>.
trans-unit.target: 如前文所述，<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>使用绘制区域<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>。

trans-unit.source: The most common type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> to use with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>, which describes a bitmap graphic.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的类型<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>用于<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>，用于描述位图图形。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> to paint using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object, but it is simpler to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> instead.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>来绘制使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>对象，但它会更易于使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>相反。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> objects, see [Imaging Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/imaging-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>对象，请参阅[图像概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/imaging-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> features, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>功能，请参阅[使用图像、 图形和视觉对象进行绘制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)概述。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> class inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>类继承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>对象具有一些特殊功能，其中包括以下： 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享，使只读的以提高性能，克隆，并进行线程安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: to display images that you don't have <see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" /> or <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> access for.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示图像不具有<see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" />或<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />访问。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> class with no content.
trans-unit.target: 不使用任何内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The image to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> class that paints an area with the specified image.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 类的新实例，该实例利用指定的图像绘制区域。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" />，所克隆对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The image displayed by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 由此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> paints an area with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>使用绘制区域<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>。

trans-unit.source: The most common type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> to use with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>, which describes a bitmap graphic.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的类型<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>用于<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>，用于描述位图图形。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> to paint using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object, but it is simpler to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> instead.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>来绘制使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>对象，但它会更易于使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>相反。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> objects, see [Imaging Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/imaging-overview.md) and [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>对象，请参阅[图像概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/imaging-overview.md)和[绘制图像、 绘图、 和视觉对象](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)

trans-unit.target: *imageUri*

trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的映像。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource" /> 依赖项属性。
